title: Tips for a Successful Fall Garden & When to Plant for Fall Harvest
itunes:title: Tips for a Successful Fall Garden & When to Plant for Fall Harvest
description: Have fresh veggies all fall and into winter straight from the garden (and no greenhouse required) with these tips for a fall garden. The first year or two I tried fall gardening it didn't turn out so well, but now we harvest many plants clear through until January, even in our northern climate. For the full planting list with dates go to https://melissaknorris.com/265 Get the chart (and my book) on how much to plant per person at http://familygardenplan.com
